description: The DescribeConnectionType API provides full details of the supported options for a given connection type in Glue.

parameters.name: ConnectionType
parameters.description: The name of the connection type to be described.

nested_items.name: ConnectionType
nested_items.description: The name of the connection type.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the connection type.

nested_items.name: Capabilities
nested_items.description: The supported authentication types, data interface types (compute environments), and data operations of the connector.

nested_items.name: SupportedAuthenticationTypes
nested_items.description: A list of supported authentication types.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SupportedDataOperations
nested_items.description: A list of supported data operations.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SupportedComputeEnvironments
nested_items.description: A list of supported compute environments.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConnectionProperties
nested_items.description: Connection properties which are common across compute environments.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the property.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the property.

nested_items.name: Required
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the property is required.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value for the property.

nested_items.name: PropertyTypes
nested_items.description: Describes the type of property.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: A list of AllowedValue objects representing the values allowed for the property.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the allowed value.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value allowed for the property.

nested_items.name: DataOperationScopes
nested_items.description: Indicates which data operations are applicable to the property.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConnectionOptions
nested_items.description: Returns properties that can be set when creating a connection in the ConnectionInput.ConnectionProperties. ConnectionOptions defines parameters that can be set in a Spark ETL script in the connection options map passed to a dataframe.
